source.name: Recipient-executed Grants -  Commitments and Disbursements
source.description: A Recipient-executed Grant is a Trust Fund Grant that is provided to a third party under a grant agreement, and for which the Bank plays an operational role - i.e., the Bank normally appraises and supervises activities financed by these funds. This dataset provides data on the amount of grant funds committed in the course of a fiscal year and payments made out of a Trust Fund account to eligible recipients, in accordance with the legal agreements.  In fulfilling its responsibilities, the World Bank as Trustee complies with all sanctions applicable to World Bank transactions. Data is provided at the individual Trust Fund level. All definitions should be regarded at present as provisional and not final, and are subject to revision at any time. Please refer to http://www.cfpto.org/TFGlossary2012/ for the Trust Fund Glossary.

datasets.description: A Recipient-executed Grant is a Trust Fund Grant that is provided to a third party under a grant agreement, and for which the Bank plays an operational role - i.e., the Bank normally appraises and supervises activities financed by these funds. This dataset provides data on the amount of grant funds committed in the course of a fiscal year and payments made out of a Trust Fund account to eligible recipients, in accordance with the legal agreements.  In fulfilling its responsibilities, the World Bank as Trustee complies with all sanctions applicable to World Bank transactions. Data is provided at the individual Trust Fund level. All definitions should be regarded at present as provisional and not final, and are subject to revision at any time.

datasets.name: Moldova - Trust Funds
datasets.description: Trust Funds as compared to 'current' TFs as of March 10, 2012. Note: This is based on a 'snapshot' of data. See 'as of' date in the underlying dataset to see when the snapshot was captured.

datasets.name: Afghanistan TFs Comm/Disb
datasets.description: A Recipient-executed Grant is a Trust Fund Grant that is provided to a third party under a grant agreement, and for which the Bank plays an operational role - i.e., the Bank normally appraises and supervises activities financed by these funds. This dataset provides data on the amount of grant funds committed in the course of a fiscal year and payments made out of a Trust Fund account to eligible recipients, in accordance with the legal agreements.  In fulfilling its responsibilities, the World Bank as Trustee complies with all sanctions applicable to World Bank transactions. Data is provided at the individual Trust Fund level. All definitions should be regarded at present as provisional and not final, and are subject to revision at any time. Please refer to http://www.cfpto.org/TFGlossary2012/ for the Trust Fund Glossary.
